subject: Re: PD LP's
preview: Hi Dimitri,  Thanks for checking in. Yes, the domain is correct.  Could you please confirm whether you'll be supplying the files, or if Rami will be handling the upload?  Looking forward to your updat

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri,

Thanks for checking in. Yes, the domain is correct.

Could you please confirm whether you'll be supplying the files, or if Rami will be handling the upload?

Looking forward to your update.
@joel - I think they need to get Rami to upload the files for them?

action.text: Andy Crebar assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

Is this the correct domain https://googleanniversary.pointdot.com.au/? When I click it, I land on a page that looks like my screenshot below??

Thanks,
Dimitri
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Dimitri,

Just confirming that we have set-up this site:
https://googleanniversary.pointdot.com.au

You can login here:
https://googleanniversary.pointdot.com.au/wp-admin

Once you have the files from Rami, let us know if you'd like us to help on the install.
Thanks @joel - please make sure we include the custom work on there invoice for time invested on this pray🙏

Hi Dimitri,

We have created you as a user. Password reset has been sent to your email.
https://googleanniversary.pointdot.com.au/
https://googleanniversary.pointdot.com.au/wp-admin

Hi Dimitri,

We are working on this.

We are generating the server now and will send you logins ones it is done.
Do you need us to upload a specific files?

Hi Andy,

Can I get an update on this? I also need to work with the WOLFIQ team to duplicate the existing funnel (making some changes to questions) and integrate to pdwise and I need this all done by EOW.

Thanks,
Dimitri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Thanks Dimitri.

@Wolf IQ Support will get this taken care of and confirm this week.

On Fri, Mar 7, 2025 at 3:12 PM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hey Dimitri,

We can action the above, but they will need to be on subdomains as they are separate wordpress installs.

So they would load on:

- 25yearsgoogle.pointdot.com.au
- profitinarecession.pointdot.com.au

We can duplicate the funnel as well and push the leads into PDWise.

Note, each site will need its own plan. We can run with the hosting only option and then bill at an hourly rate to get this up and running.

Please confirm if this is ok? We can schedule it for early next week.

Thanks,
Andy

Awesome, thanks Rami!

No idea what the landing pages are for haha. Dim, over to you please :)

Andy and I are standing by to get them live and ready to roll!

Rami, FYI, we have a new Director here that has joined the 'Pack'. Andy is cc'd in and I will 100% arrange for you guys to meet. Andy is heading up the business and I'm stepping back behind the scenes. There are some mega plans in the pipeline, primarily scaling our existing offering. Andy is currently working on bolstering our systems and processes to prepare for the growth. Our team has also nearly doubled, it's all very exciting. Give us a couple of weeks to get everything humming along and then we will 'formally' meet. Either way, I'm sure I owe you a kebab haha.

Until then, it's business as usual :)

Dim, we are standy by for your enlightenment.

Cheers,

Heath
